info.name: Spring microservice APIs
info.description:
There are four microservices namely:

- Auth service (containing user service)
    
- Employee service
    
- Department service
    
- Review service
    

This documentation provides details on how to interact with the various microservices: Auth Service, Employee Service, Department Service, and Review Service. Authentication for protected endpoints is managed using JWT.

### Using the postman,

Once you login from the login endpoint, the token will be automatically added to the collection variable and auth process can take place.
